p: Traditional healers in different parts of Ethiopia use a wide range of traditional medicinal plants to treatand manage pain and inflammation. But, the therapeutic potentials of some of these medicinal plants have not been scientifically evaluated and validated so far. 11 Echinops kebericho M. is among the traditional medicinal plants used in Ethiopian folk medicine, and is frequently reported for its antinociceptive and anti-inflammatory potentials. 12, 13
